subSubSection.paragraph:
Specimens examined. One female on
Brugmansia
sp., at Chiang Mai Province,
August 2003
, collected by M. Kongchuensin.

Dorsal shield 360 long and 194 wide;

for the holotype and for specimens from New South Wales , Australia .
